feed.title: Track Awesome Cheminformatics Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of Cheminformatics libraries and software.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jun 09, 2023
entry.content:
Libraries / Machine Learning

  • Chemprop (⭐2k) - Directed message passing neural networks for property prediction of molecules and reactions with uncertainty and interpretation.

Libraries / Docking

  • DOCKSTRING (⭐172) - Automates and standardizes ligand preparation for AutoDock Vina.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jan 07, 2023
entry.content:
Applications / Virtual Machine

  • 3D e-Chem Virtual Machine (⭐17) - Virtual machine with all software and sample data to run 3D-e-Chem Knime workflows

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jan 05, 2023
entry.content:
Libraries / Web APIs

  • ambit - offers chemoinformatics functionality via REST web services.

Libraries / Databases

  • Chemical Translation Service - Source code of the Chemical Translation Service web service.

Libraries / Molecular Dynamics

  • ProDy (⭐485) - A Python package for protein dynamics analysis

Libraries / Others

  • Gypsum-DL - a program for converting 2D SMILES strings to 3D models.
  • RDchiral (⭐162) - Wrapper for RDKit's RunReactants to improve stereochemistry handling
  • confgen (⭐6) - Webapp for generating conformers

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Dec 14, 2022
entry.content:
See Also / Books

  • awesome-molecular-docking (⭐102) - A curated list of molecular docking software, datasets, and other closely related resources.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Dec 03, 2022
entry.content:
Libraries / Machine Learning

  • DGL-LifeSci (⭐758) - DGL-LifeSci is a DGL-based package for various applications in life science with graph neural network.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Aug 30, 2022
entry.content:
Libraries / Machine Learning

  • olorenchemengine - Molecular property prediction with unified API for diverse models and respresentations, with integrated uncertainty quantification, interpretability, and hyperparameter/architecture tuning.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jun 17, 2022
entry.content:
Libraries / Others

  • Auto-QChem (⭐102) - an automated workflow for the generation and storage of DFT calculations for organic molecules.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Feb 06, 2022
entry.content:
Libraries / General Purpose

  • CGRtools (⭐47) - Toolkit for processing molecules, reactions and condensed graphs of reactions. Can be used for chemical standardization, MCS search, tautomers generation with backward compatibility to RDKit and NetworkX.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jan 06, 2022
entry.content:
See Also / Books

  • awesome-small-molecule-ml (⭐224) - A list of papers, data sets, and other resources for machine learning for small-molecule drug discovery.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Dec 22, 2021
entry.content:
Libraries / Format Checking

  • pdb-tools (⭐421) - A swiss army knife for manipulating and editing PDB files.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Sep 17, 2021
entry.content:
Resources / Blogs

  • Cheminformania - Blog of Ph.D, Esben Jannik Bjerrum, who is a Principle Scientist and a Machine Learning and AI specialists at AstraZeneca.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Aug 31, 2021
entry.content:
Libraries / General Purpose

  • datamol (⭐505): - Molecular Manipulation Made Easy. A light wrapper build on top of RDKit.

Libraries / Visualization

  • RDKit.js - Official JavaScript distribution of cheminformatics functionality from the RDKit - a C++ library for cheminformatics.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jun 15, 2021
entry.content:
Libraries / Machine Learning

  • Summit (⭐131) - A python package for optimizing chemical reactions using machine learning (contains 10 algorithms + several benchmarks).

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Dec 26, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / Format Checking

  • ChEMBL_Structure_Pipeline (formerly standardiser) (⭐209) - Tool designed to provide a simple way of standardising molecules as a prelude to e.g. molecular modelling exercises.

Libraries / Machine Learning

  • ChemML (⭐168) - ChemML is a machine learning and informatics program suite for the analysis, mining, and modeling of chemical and materials data. (based on Tensorflow)
  • chemmodlab (⭐17) - A Cheminformatics Modeling Laboratory for Fitting and Assessing Machine Learning Models in R.

Libraries / Others

  • OPSIN (⭐179) - Open Parser for Systematic IUPAC nomenclature

Resources / Courses

  • Cheminformatics OLCC - Cheminformatics course of the Collaborative Intercollegiate Online Chemistry Course (OLCC) course of University of Arkansas at Little Rock by Robert Belford

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jul 14, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / Molecular Descriptors

  • DescriptaStorus (⭐261) - Descriptor computation(chemistry) and (optional) storage for machine learning.

Libraries / Docking

  • Rosetta - A comprehensive software suite for modeling macromolecular structures. Used larely for protein-protein docking.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jun 12, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / General Purpose

  • MolecularGraph.jl (⭐211) - A graph-based molecule modeling and chemoinformatics analysis toolkit fully implemented in Julia

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 27, 2020
entry.content:
Resources / Blogs

  • Cheminformatics 2.0 - Blog of Alex M. Clark, a research scientist at Collaborative Drug Discovery.
  • Depth-First - Blog of Richard L. Apodaca, a chemist living in La Jolla, California.

See Also / Books

  • MolSSI Molecular Software Database ＊Pages created by Tobias Kind, PhD

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 21, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / Web APIs

  • CIRpy - Python wrapper for the NCI Chemical Identifier Resolver (CIR).
  • chemminetools (⭐39) - Open source web framework for small molecule analysis based on Django.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 19, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / General Purpose

  • ChemPy (⭐596) - A Python package useful for chemistry (mainly physical/inorganic/analytical chemistry)

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 17, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / Others

  • eiR (⭐3) - Accelerated similarity searching of small molecules

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 16, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / Machine Learning

  • OpenChem (⭐715) - OpenChem is a deep learning toolkit for Computational Chemistry with PyTorch backend.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 13, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / Molecular Dynamics

  • NAMD - a parallel molecular dynamics code designed for high-performance simulation of large biomolecular systems.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 10, 2020
entry.content:
Applications / Command Line Tools

  • BCL::Commons

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Apr 26, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / Others

  • Cookiecutter for Computational Molecular Sciences (⭐427) - Python-centric Cookiecutter for Molecular Computational Chemistry Packages by MolSSL

Resources / Courses

  • Python for chemoinformatics (⭐230)

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Apr 20, 2020
entry.content:
Resources / Courses

  • Simulation in Chemistry and Biochemistry - by Dr. Jay Ponder, a professor from WashU St.Louis.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Mar 23, 2020
entry.content:
Resources / Courses

  • Molecular modeling course - by Dr. Jay Ponder, a professor from WashU St.Louis.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Mar 13, 2020
entry.content:
Applications / Visualization

  • Chimera - Highly extensible program for interactive molecular visualization and analysis. Source is available.
  • ChimeraX - The next-generation molecular visualization program, following UCSF Chimera. Source is available here.

Applications / Virtual Machine

  • myChEMBL - A version of ChEMBL built using Open Source software (Ubuntu, PostgreSQL, RDKit)

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Mar 12, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / Visualization

  • nglviewer - Interactive molecular graphics for Jupyter notebooks.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jan 29, 2020
entry.content:
Resources / Books

  • Molecular Descriptors for Chemoinformatics - More than 3300 descriptors and related terms for chemoinformatic analysis of chemical compound properties.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jan 28, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / Molecular Descriptors

  • Rcpi - R/Bioconductor package to generate various descriptors of proteins, compounds and their interactions.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jan 08, 2020
entry.content:
Libraries / Format Checking

  • rd_filters (⭐145) - A script to run structural alerts using the RDKit and ChEMBL

Libraries / Machine Learning

  • DeepChem (⭐6.1k) - Deep learning library for Chemistry based on Tensorflow
  • pytorch-geometric - A PyTorch library provides implementation of many graph convolution algorithms.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jan 05, 2020
entry.content:
Applications / Visualization

  • DataWarrior - A program for data Visualization and analysis which combines dynamic graphical views and interactive row filtering with chemical intelligence.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Dec 16, 2019
entry.content:
Resources / Courses

  • BigChem - All lectures of BigChem (A Horizon 2020 MSC ITN EID project, which provides innovative education in large chemical data analysis.)

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Oct 29, 2019
entry.content:
Libraries / Visualization

  • 3Dmol.js (⭐878) - An object-oriented, webGL based JavaScript library for online molecular visualization.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Oct 24, 2019
entry.content:
Resources / Blogs

  • Is life worth living? - Some examples for cheminformatics libraries.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Sep 18, 2019
entry.content:
Resources / Blogs

  • DrugDiscovery.NET - Blog of Andreas Bender, who is a Reader for Molecular Informatics at University of Cambridge.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Sep 06, 2019
entry.content:
Resources / Courses

  • TeachOpenCADD (⭐880) - A teaching platform for computer-aided drug design (CADD) using open source packages and data.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jun 19, 2019
entry.content:
Applications / Command Line Tools

  • Packmol - Initial configurations for molecular dynamics simulations by packing optimization.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Jun 11, 2019
entry.content:
Libraries / Machine Learning

  • chainer-chemistry (⭐671) - A Library for Deep Learning in Biology and Chemistry.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Feb 28, 2019
entry.content:
Libraries / Molecular Descriptors

  • Align-it - Align molecules according their pharmacophores.

Resources / Blogs

  • Open Source Molecular Modeling - Updateable catalog of open source molecular modeling software.
  • Noel O'Blog - Blog of Noel O'Boyle, who is a Senior Software Engineer at NextMove Software.

See Also / Books

  • deeplearning-biology (⭐2.1k) - Chemoinformatics and drug discovery section in deeplearning-biology repo.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Dec 15, 2018
entry.content:
Libraries / Visualization

  • rdeditor (⭐154) - Simple RDKit molecule editor GUI using PySide.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Dec 10, 2018
entry.content:
Journals / Others

  • Journal of Cheminformatics
  • Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling (ACS Publications)

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Aug 24, 2018
entry.content:
Resources / Blogs

  • Practical Cheminformatics - Blog with in-depth examples of practical application of cheminformatics.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on Aug 09, 2018
entry.content:
Resources / Books

  • Chemoinformatics for Drug Discovery - Materials about how to use Chemoinformatics strategies to improve drug discovery results.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 28, 2018
entry.content:
Resources / Books

  • Computational Approaches in Cheminformatics and Bioinformatics - Include insights from public (NIH), academic, and industrial sources at the same time.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 15, 2018
entry.content:
Libraries / Databases

  • razi (⭐40) - Cheminformatic extension for the SQLAlchemy database.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 08, 2018
entry.content:
Libraries / General Purpose

  • CDK (Chemistry Development Kit) - Algorithms for structural chemo- and bioinformatics, implemented in Java.

Libraries / Visualization

  • JChemPaint (⭐123) - Chemical 2D structure editor application/applet based on the Chemistry Development Kit.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 04, 2018
entry.content:
Applications / Command Line Tools

  • MayaChemTools - Collection of Perl and Python scripts, modules, and classes that support day-to-day computational discovery needs.

Libraries / Molecular Dynamics

  • cclib (⭐367) - Parsers and algorithms for computational chemistry logfiles.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 03, 2018
entry.content:
Applications / Visualization

  • PyMOL - Python-enhanced molecular graphics tool.
  • Jmol - Browser-based HTML5 viewer and stand-alone Java viewer for chemical structures in 3D.
  • VMD - Molecular visualization program for displaying, animating, and analyzing large biomolecular systems using 3-D graphics and built-in scripting.

Applications / Command Line Tools

  • Open Babel - Chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of chemical data.

Applications / Docking

  • AutoDock Vina - Molecular docking and virtual screening.
  • smina - Customized AutoDock Vina to better support scoring function development and high-performance energy minimization.

Libraries / General Purpose

  • RDKit - Collection of cheminformatics and machine-learning software written in C++ and Python.
  • Indigo (⭐356) - Universal molecular toolkit that can be used for molecular fingerprinting, substructure search, and molecular visualization written in C++ package, with Java, C#, and Python wrappers.
  • ChemmineR - Cheminformatics package for analyzing drug-like small molecule data in R.

Libraries / Format Checking

  • MolVS (⭐172) - Molecule validation and standardization based on RDKit.

Libraries / Visualization

  • Kekule.js - Front-end JavaScript library for providing the ability to represent, draw, edit, compare and search molecule structures on web browsers.

Libraries / Molecular Descriptors

  • mordred (⭐414) - Molecular descriptor calculator based on RDKit.
  • mol2vec (⭐269) - Vector representations of molecular substructures.

Libraries / Web APIs

  • webchem (⭐171) - Chemical Information from the Web.
  • Beaker (⭐49) - RDKit and OSRA in the Bottle on Tornado.

Libraries / Molecular Dynamics

  • Gromacs - Molecular dynamics package mainly designed for simulations of proteins, lipids and nucleic acids.
  • OpenMM - High performance toolkit for molecular simulation including extensive language bindings for Python, C, C++, and even Fortran.
  • MDTraj (⭐652) - Analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories.

Resources / Courses

  • Learncheminformatics.com - "Cheminformatics: Navigating the world of chemical data" courese at Indiana University.

Resources / Blogs

  • PubChem Blog - News, updates and tutorials about PubChem.
  • The ChEMBL-og blog - Stories and news from Computational Chemical Biology Group at EMBL-EBI.
  • ChEMBL blog - ChEMBL on GitHub.
  • SteinBlog - Blog of Christoph Steinbeck, who is the head of cheminformatics and metabolism at the EMBL-EBI.
  • chem-bla-ics - Blog of Egon Willighagen, who is an assistant professor at Maastricht University.
  • steeveslab-blog - Some examples using RDKit.

entry.title: Awesome Cheminformatics Updates on May 02, 2018
entry.content:
Libraries / Web APIs

  • PubChemPy - Python wrapper for the PubChem PUG REST API.
  • ChemSpiPy - Python wrapper for the ChemSpider API.

Resources / Blogs

  • So much to do, so little time - Trying to squeeze sense out of chemical data - Bolg of Rajarshi Guha, who is a research scientist at NIH Center for Advancing Translational Science.  * Some old blogs 1 2.
  • Macs in Chemistry - Provide a resource for chemists using Apple Macintosh computers.

See Also / Books

  • awesome-python-chemistry (⭐1.2k) - Another list focuses on Python stuff related to Chemistry.
